content.title: $CENTS on X: "You must become genderless and explode into trillions of triangles all at once. This is what Alexander Svyatogor was getting at with Biocosmism, but with a little Scranton flair of my own. If you don’t listen to me, I’ll find you." / X
content.description: $CENTS shares a cryptic message on X, referencing Biocosmism and a 'little Scranton flair', warning of a transformation into trillions of triangles if not listened to.
content.bodyContent:

$CENTS
@centienceio
You must become genderless and explode into trillions of triangles all at once. This is what Alexander Svyatogor was getting at with Biocosmism, but with a little Scranton flair of my own. If you don’t listen to me, I’ll find you.
8:52 PM · Nov 7, 2024
·
